messages.title: It's Time for Real Change
messages.content: This is a crucially important election that will decide the future of our country for decades to come. It is a once-in-a-generation chance to transform our country and take on the vested interests holding people back.

messages.title: Give the people the final say on Brexit
messages.content: The ongoing Brexit chaos has divided our country and brought huge uncertainty for businesses and employers. Boris Johnson’s extreme Brexit proposals aim at fundamentally reshaping our country, turning us into a bargain-basement tax haven on the fringes of Europe. Only a Labour Government can deliver a public vote on Brexit and bring people back together.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Public vote on any Brexit Deal
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Anneliese will campaign to Remain as it is the best deal for Oxford and Britain.
NHS waiting lists, cuts to healthcare services, and more funding for healthcare.
A Green New Deal bringing at least 400,000 new clean, green jobs.
At least £10 an hour, stronger tenants' rights and real action on homelessness and food poverty.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Real funding increases for Oxford's cash-strapped schools
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Reduced class sizes for 5-7 year-olds and scrapping of tuition fees.

issues.brexitEurope: give the people the final say on Brexit
issues.education: real funding increases for Oxford's cash-strapped schools; reduced class sizes; scrapping of tuition fees
issues.environment: Reaction to the climate crisis; Green New Deal bringing 400,000 new clean, green jobs
issues.health: increased funding for the NHS; NHS waiting lists; cuts to healthcare services
issues.labourEmployment: Real Living Wage of at least £10 an hour
issues.socialWelfare: stronger tenants' rights; real action on homelessness and food poverty

community.content: Labour will build a fairer Britain that cares for all, where wealth and power are shared.

leaflet.personalStatement: In these testing times it is critical that we have a local MP who will stand up for our city. Anneliese lives locally in Rose Hill and is fighting for you.

politicalExperience.achievements: As a local MP with the shadow Treasury team, she has helped force the government to abandon the punitive public sector pay cap and extend the Childcare Vouchers scheme.
